abilities.reignofnether.call_lightning.t: 在目标位置召唤一道闪电。
可用于为苦力怕充能或直接攻击敌人。
abilities.reignofnether.summon_vexes.too: 较长时间后召唤 %d 只恼鬼参与攻击唤魔者的目标。
the evoker's target. Vexes start to die off after %d seconds.
abilities.reignofnether.connect_portal.t: 链接到你建造的其他连接传送门。
注意将覆盖二者先前有过的其它链接。
abilities.reignofnether.connect_porta.er: 只能链接到另一个由你建造好的连接传送门！
abilities.reignofnether.fire_wall_shot.t: 发射一记精准射击，点燃沿线的所有方块。
注意当本技能冷却时烈焰人无法攻击。
abilities.reignofnether.mount_hoglin: 骑乘疣猪兽（鼠标右击以自动选择坐骑）
abilities.reignofnether.mount_ravager: 骑乘劫掠兽（鼠标右击以自动选择坐骑）
abilities.reignofnether.mount_ravager.to: 骑乘在上的掠夺者将获得爆炸箭。
abilities.reignofnether.mount_spider: 骑乘蜘蛛（鼠标右击以自动选择坐骑）
只有卫道士、掠夺者和唤魔者可以被提升。
将一名灾厄村民提升为队长，给予其一张旗帜、
使半径 %d 格范围内的友方单位获得迅捷效果。
你每个城堡的此技能只能提升一名队长。
abilities.reignofnether.roar.tooltip2: 发出震耳欲聋的咆哮，将附近的敌人击飞，
abilities.reignofnether.roar.tooltip3: 并造成伤害，暂时减缓他们的移动速度。
abilities.reignofnether.evoker_fangs_cir: 让这个唤魔者在攻击时召唤出一圈
abilities.reignofnether.evoker_fangs_lin: 让这个唤魔者在攻击时召唤出一条
指向目标的的尖牙利齿。
abilities.reignofnether.sonic_boom.error: 该技能必须对某一单位或建筑使用！
abilities.reignofnether.sonic_boom.toolt: 短暂延迟后，向目标发射一道音波
造成大量伤害并将其击飞一段距离。
abilities.reignofnether.harming_potion.t: 投掷一瓶对敌方单位造成瞬间伤害的药水。
abilities.reignofnether.healing_potion.t: 投掷一瓶为友方单位瞬间恢复生命的药水。
abilities.reignofnether.lingering_harmin: 投掷一瓶留下致命粒子云的药水。
abilities.reignofnether.lingering_healin: 投掷一瓶留下治疗粒子云的药水。
abilities.reignofnether.shield_stance.to: 举起或放下盾牌，举起时可减少原先 67% 的远程攻击伤害，
但移动速度也将减少原先的 50%。
building.reignofnether.outside_map: 此处距离地图边界过近或超出边界
building.reignofnether.too_close: 此处距离其他建筑过近
building.reignofnether.must_be_nether: 此建筑仅能建造在下界地形上
building.reignofnether.must_be_liquid: 此建筑仅能建造在水域或熔岩上
building.reignofnether.build_centre_here: 在这里建造你的城镇中心！
buildings.monsters.reignofnether.dark_wa: 一座恶兆之塔，可以进驻单位。
进驻入内的远程单位射程提升。
buildings.monsters.reignofnether.dungeon: 一座暴怒囚笼，具有创造苦力怕的能力。
buildings.monsters.reignofnether.graveya: 一片死亡之地，可以复苏僵尸和骷髅。
buildings.monsters.reignofnether.haunted: 一座鬼魂萦绕的房屋，可以提供人口。
buildings.monsters.reignofnether.laborat: 一间邪恶实验室，可基于已建造的其他建筑研究新科技。
buildings.monsters.reignofnether.mausole: 一块死亡之墓，从中可以诞生僵尸村民。
可将%d格半径内的时间扭曲至午夜。
你只能有一座首府建筑。
buildings.monsters.reignofnether.pumpkin: 一片南瓜田，可以种植收获食物资源。
南瓜是不需要复耕的，但种南瓜会消耗更多资源。
buildings.monsters.reignofnether.spider_: 一座盘丝洞，可以孵化各种蜘蛛。
buildings.monsters.reignofnether.spruce_: 一座可穿越水域的桥梁。
必须依托陆地或其他桥梁延伸。
可在岩浆上建造（但不防火）。
任何玩家都可以攻击或修复任何桥梁。
供玩家和工人单位存储资源用。
buildings.monsters.reignofnether.strongh: 一座恶气冲天的要塞，从中可以训练监守者。
可将%d格半径内的时间扭曲至午夜。
需要墓地、蜘蛛巢穴和地牢以建造。
使军用传送门能够训练猪灵的大军。
需要基础传送门以建造。
buildings.piglins.reignofnether.blacksto: 一座可穿越水域或岩浆的桥梁。
必须依托陆地或其他桥梁延伸。
任何玩家都可以攻击或修复任何桥梁。
buildings.piglins.reignofnether.central_: 一座最基础的传送门，能够生产猪灵咕哝者。
你只能有一座首府建筑。
buildings.piglins.reignofnether.flame_sa: 灼热的熔岩与砖柱，使其能够承载烈焰人的高温。
使军用传送门能够训练烈焰人。
buildings.piglins.reignofnether.fortress: 一座壮观的下界要塞，可以使军用传送门训练恶魂。
需要烈焰圣域和凋灵神祠以建造。
buildings.piglins.reignofnether.hoglin_s: 一座用于在主世界繁育疣猪兽的牧屋。
使军用传送门能够生产疣猪兽。
需要基础传送门以建造。
buildings.piglins.reignofnether.netherwa: 一片下界疣田，可以种植收获食物资源。
工人单位会自动消耗木材复耕。
buildings.piglins.reignofnether.portal.t: 能够转化主世界为下界环境的黑曜石传送门。
可以升级为功能各异的传送门。
在主世界地形上也可以建造，不过速度减半。
buildings.piglins.reignofnether.wither_s: 一座信奉凋灵力量的黑暗神祠。
使军用传送门能够训练凋灵骷髅。。
buildings.villagers.reignofnether.arcane: 一座魔法高塔，女巫和唤魔者在此居住。
buildings.villagers.reignofnether.barrac: 训练卫道士和掠夺者的军营。
buildings.villagers.reignofnether.blacks: 用于升级军队武器和研究铁傀儡的铁匠铺。
buildings.villagers.reignofnether.castle: 一座可以生产劫掠兽的宏伟城堡。
需要铁匠铺、奥术塔和军营以建造。
buildings.villagers.reignofnether.iron_g: 可以随处搭建的铁傀儡。
需要在铁匠铺研究科技以建造。
buildings.villagers.reignofnether.librar: 众多书架环绕的附魔台。
用于研究魔法相关的升级。
buildings.villagers.reignofnether.oak_br: 一座可穿越水域的桥梁。
必须依托陆地或其他桥梁延伸。
可在熔岩上建造（但不防火）。
任何玩家都可以攻击或修复任何桥梁。
buildings.villagers.reignofnether.oak_st: 供玩家和工人单位存储资源用。
buildings.villagers.reignofnether.town_c: 你村庄中心的大亭台，从中可以生产村民。
你只能有一座首府建筑。
buildings.villagers.reignofnether.villag: 一座提供人口的简单房屋。
buildings.villagers.reignofnether.watcht: 一座可以进驻单位的塔楼。
进驻入内的远程单位射程提升。
buildings.villagers.reignofnether.wheat_: 一片小麦田，可以种植收获食物资源。
工人单位会自动消耗木材复耕。
commands.reignofnether.toggle_fow: %s - 为所有玩家开关战争迷雾
commands.reignofnether.reset: %s - 清除对局中所有单位/建筑，将所有玩家重设为观察者模式
commands.reignofnether.lock: %s - 使新玩家无法加入对局
controls.reignofnether.toggle_cam: F12 - 切换原版/RTS 视角
controls.reignofnether.toggle_fps_tps: F7 - 开关 FPS/TPS 统计
controls.reignofnether.toggle_leaves: F6 - 开关隐藏树叶（实验性功能）
controls.reignofnether.deselect: ~ - 取消选中所有单位/建筑
controls.reignofnether.command: 鼠标右击 - 移动、攻击或设置集结点
controls.reignofnether.create_group: Ctrl + 数字键 - 编队分组
controls.reignofnether.recenter_map: Shift + 鼠标左击小地图 - 迅速移动视野并置于小地图中心
controls.reignofnether.select_same: 鼠标左键双击单位 - 选中所有同种单位
controls.reignofnether.destroy: Delete - 摧毁选中的所有单位/建筑
controls.reignofnether.rotate_cam: Alt + 鼠标右键 - 旋转视角
controls.reignofnether.zoom: Alt + 鼠标滚轮 - 旋转视角
controls.reignofnether.rotate: 鼠标滚轮 - 旋转建筑放置方向
fogofwar.reignofnether.experimental: 你即将为所有玩家启用战争迷雾。该实验性功能具有以下问题：
fogofwar.reignofnether.optifine_crash: - 所有安装 Optifine 玩家的游戏将会崩溃
fogofwar.reignofnether.chunk_bugs: - 可能会导致区块渲染错误
fogofwar.reignofnether.cpu_usage: - 增加CPU使用率（降低区块渲染距离将有所缓解）
fogofwar.reignofnether.to_confirm: 请再次输入 /rts-fog enable 以确认启用战争迷雾
hud.control_group.reignofnether.control_: 编队 %s（鼠标右击以移除编队）
hud.startbuttons.villagers.reignofnether: 在目标位置生成三名村民。
在目标位置生成三名僵尸村民。
hud.startbuttons.piglins.reignofnether.s: 在目标位置生成三名猪灵咕哝者。
hud.orthoview.reignofnether.hiding_leave: 隐藏树叶：单位与鼠标周围的树叶
hud.reignofnether.worker_inv_full: 工人背包已满，正在交付资源……
hud.reignofnether.no_destination: 该传送门没有通往任意目标！
server.reignofnether.lost_capitol: %s已失去了他们的首府建筑，若在 %d 秒前未能成功重建，将在地图上暴露行迹！
server.reignofnether.lost_all: 失去了所有单位和建筑
server.reignofnether.players_remaining: 场上还剩下 %d 名玩家
server.reignofnether.match_locked: 本场对局已锁定，新玩家暂时无法加入对局。
server.reignofnether.match_unlocked: 本场对局已解锁，新玩家可以加入对局了。
server.reignofnether.sync_enabled: 已启用对局登录数据同步。
server.reignofnether.sync_disabled: 已禁用对局登录数据同步。
server.reignofnether.enabled_fog_of_war: 已为所有玩家启用战争迷雾
server.reignofnether.disabled_fog_of_war: 已为所有玩家禁用战争迷雾
server.reignofnether.locked: 本场对局已锁定，新玩家暂时无法加入对局。
server.reignofnether.already_started: 你已经有正在游玩的对局了！
server.reignofnether.outside_border: 无法在地图边界外开局
server.reignofnether.total_players: 现在场上共有 %d 名玩家
server.reignofnether.revealed: %s未能重建首府，行迹已在地图上暴露出来！
Allows portals to be constructed off of nether terrain
and enables them to be upgraded into transport portals,
which can instantly teleport units between them.
research.reignofnether.blaze_firewall.to: Allows Blazes to fire a single shot that ignites all
blocks in a line, but disables their attacks temporarily.
research.reignofnether.brute_shields.too: Allows Brutes to raise a shield to reduce projectile
damage taken by 67%% and movement speed by 50%%.
research.reignofnether.castle_flag.toolt: Upgrades this castle to be able to promote an illager unit
to a captain that provides a speed aura to friendly units.
Each upgraded castle may only support one captain at a time.
research.reignofnether.drowned.tooltip1: Transforms all of your zombies into drowned, which
research.reignofnether.drowned.tooltip2: zombify Villager and Piglin units after killing them.
research.reignofnether.evoker_vexes.tool: Unlocks the ability for evokers to summon vexes.
Requires evokers to have been unlocked.
research.reignofnether.fire_resistance.t: Your units become immune to fire tick damage and magma.
Standing directly in fire or lava still causes damage.
research.reignofnether.golem_smithing.to: Allows villagers to construct iron golems.
research.reignofnether.heavy_tridents.to: Headhunters' tridents knock enemies back on hit.
research.reignofnether.hoglin_cavalry.to: Unlocks the ability for headhunters to mount hoglins.
research.reignofnether.husks.tooltip1: Transforms all of your zombies into husks,
research.reignofnether.husks.tooltip2: granting them +%d health and immunity to sunlight.
research.reignofnether.lightning_rod.too: Adds a lightning rod to this lab that can be activated
to call lightning to charge creepers and damage enemies.
research.reignofnether.lingering_potions: Doubles the duration of witches' potion clouds.
research.reignofnether.pillager_crossbow: Enchants the crossbows of all pillagers with multishot
research.reignofnether.poison_spiders.to: Transforms your Spiders into Cave Spiders,
research.reignofnether.civilian_portal.t: Convert into a civilian portal, supplying 15 population
and allowing workers to drop resources off here.
research.reignofnether.military_portal.t: Convert into a military portal, allowing production
of military units based on the buildings you own.
Convert into a transport portal, allowing for instant
teleportation of units to another linked transport portal.
research.reignofnether.ravager_cavalry.t: Unlocks the ability for pillagers to mount ravagers,
gaining explosive arrows that shoot upwards like mortar.
research.reignofnether.resource_capacity: Raises the resource capacity of workers from 100 to 200
Workers still auto-return resources when holding above 50
research.reignofnether.silverfish.toolti: Gives your buildings a %d chance to spawn
a silverfish whenever a block is destroyed.
research.reignofnether.spider_jockeys.to: Unlocks the ability for skeletons to mount spiders.
research.reignofnether.strays.tooltip1: Transforms all of your skeletons into
research.reignofnether.vindicator_axes.t: Upgrades the axes of all vindicators to diamond (+2 damage)
research.reignofnether.wither_clouds.too: Enemies killed by wither skeletons leave
behind a deadly cloud of wither on death.
tutorial.reignofnether.welcome2: Welcome to the Reign of Nether Tutorial!
tutorial.reignofnether.join: Press F12 to toggle RTS camera and join the game
tutorial.reignofnether.help: Use '/rts-help' to see the list of all commands
tutorial.reignofnether.controls: Use '/rts-controls' to see the list of controls
tutorial.reignofnether.locked: This RTS match has been locked. Please wait for a new game before joining.
tutorial.reignofnether.welcome_back: Welcome back to Reign of Nether
tutorial.reignofnether.op_commands: As a server op you may use:
tutorial.reignofnether.sync_disabled1: RTS Syncing has been disabled, so you cannot select buildings or see unit owners, sorry!
tutorial.reignofnether.sync_disabled2: To resolve this, please ask the host to re-enable it, then relog.
tutorial.reignofnether.server_not_found: Failed to load tutorial, server couldn't be found.
tutorial.reignofnether.skipping: Skipping tutorial stage... you are now on: %s
tutorial.reignofnether.ready_continue: Press SPACE when you're ready to continue.
tutorial.reignofnether.rts_view: Welcome to RTS view. Instead of the usual first-person minecraft camera, here we can view the world from a top-down perspective.
tutorial.reignofnether.see_again: TIP: If you want to see any of these messages again, open chat with ENTER or the button on the right.
tutorial.reignofnether.reminder: If at any point you're lost or need a reminder on what to do next, click the button at the top right. Try doing that now to continue.
tutorial.reignofnether.need_click: You needed to click this button, which you just did. Great work!
tutorial.reignofnether.move_camera: To move your camera, move your mouse to the edges of the screen. Try it now.
tutorial.reignofnether.move_camera2: Move your mouse to each edge of your screen until the camera starts moving, as shown by the arrows.
tutorial.reignofnether.tip.arrow_keys: TIP: You can also move the camera with arrow keys.
tutorial.reignofnether.tip.zoom: TIP: You can zoom the camera with ALT+SCROLL and rotate it with ALT+RIGHT-CLICK.
tutorial.reignofnether.minimap: Since you could get lost with a top-down view like this, here's a minimap for you to help navigate.
tutorial.reignofnether.map_click: You can move around the world quickly by clicking on a spot on the map. Try doing that now.
tutorial.reignofnether.map_click2: Click a spot on the minimap at the bottom right to move the camera there
tutorial.reignofnether.recenter: If you need to move really far away, you can also SHIFT+CLICK to recentre the map on that location.
tutorial.reignofnether.tip.expand_map: TIP: Press M or click the bottom right button to expand the map. The very dark areas are outside the world border.
tutorial.reignofnether.playing_units: It's time to start playing with some units.
tutorial.reignofnether.spawn_villagers: Let's get started by spawning in some villagers here.
tutorial.reignofnether.spawn_villagers2: Click the button at the top right and then click on the ground where you want to place your villagers.
tutorial.reignofnether.worker_units: Villagers are your worker units who can build and gather resources and are essential to starting and maintaining a good base.
tutorial.reignofnether.select_worker2: LEFT-CLICK a villager to select it.
tutorial.reignofnether.move_worker: Now, RIGHT-CLICK where you want to move it.
tutorial.reignofnether.move_worker2: LEFT-CLICK a villager to select it, then RIGHT-CLICK on the ground to move it.
tutorial.reignofnether.select_villagers: Now let's try selecting a group of villagers.
tutorial.reignofnether.select_villagers2: To do this, hold LEFT-CLICK and DRAG your mouse across them, then release to select.
tutorial.reignofnether.select_villagers3: Hold LEFT-CLICK and DRAG your mouse across a group of villagers, then release to select them.
tutorial.reignofnether.move_group: Now, RIGHT-CLICK where you want to move the group.
tutorial.reignofnether.move_group2: With a group of villagers selected, RIGHT-CLICK on the ground to move them.
tutorial.reignofnether.tip.select_same: TIP: You can also double click a unit to select all units of the same type.
tutorial.reignofnether.tip.deselect: TIP: If you want to deselect your units, press the tilde (~) key
tutorial.reignofnether.tip.grouping: TIP: For you RTS fans, control grouping with CTRL+NUM is also a feature.
tutorial.reignofnether.start_base: It's time to start your base.
tutorial.reignofnether.capitol: The first and most important building of any base is always the capitol.
tutorial.reignofnether.good_spot: This looks like a good spot for it, being flat ground, near lots of resources and with plenty of space around it for other buildings.
tutorial.reignofnether.building_resource: Note that building takes resources. Luckily, the TOP-LEFT shows we have more than enough WOOD and ORE needed.
tutorial.reignofnether.place_capitol: Select your workers, then click the bottom-left button and click on the ground where you want to place your capitol.
tutorial.reignofnether.place_capitol2: Select your workers, then click the bottom-left button and click on the ground to place a town centre.
tutorial.reignofnether.all_workers_build: If they aren't already, you can have all of your villagers help to build to speed up progress. To do this, select your workers and RIGHT-CLICK the building.
tutorial.reignofnether.wait_for_capitol: Just wait for your Town Centre to complete. If your workers stopped building for some reason, just select them and RIGHT-CLICK it to resume.
tutorial.reignofnether.select_building: You can also select the building itself like a unit to see how far along it is in building.
tutorial.reignofnether.congratulations: Congratulations, you now have a base set up!
tutorial.reignofnether.capitols_produce_: Capitols like the Town Centre are the only building that can produce workers like villagers.
tutorial.reignofnether.worker_cost: Note that producing workers takes 50 FOOD each. We should have enough resources for quite a lot
tutorial.reignofnether.rally_point: LEFT-CLICK to select your Town Centre, RIGHT-CLICK to set a rally point - units will automatically go to that spot when they appear.
tutorial.reignofnether.rally_point2: LEFT-CLICK to select your Town Centre, then RIGHT-CLICK on the ground to set a rally point.
tutorial.reignofnether.make_villager: Now let's try making a villager. With your Town Centre selected, click the bottom-left button to start producing one.
tutorial.reignofnether.make_villager2: LEFT-CLICK to select your Town Centre, click the bottom-left button make a villager, then wait for it to be completed.
tutorial.reignofnether.tip.queue: TIP: you can queue up as many units to build as you can afford.
tutorial.reignofnether.nice_work_workers: Nice work. Workers are vital for a healthy base!
tutorial.reignofnether.tip.cancel: TIP: you can cancel any in-progress units for a full refund by clicking their icon at the bottom.
tutorial.reignofnether.gather_resources: Now that we have a bunch of workers, we can start gathering some resources.
tutorial.reignofnether.forest: There's a forest over here that we can get wood from.
tutorial.reignofnether.gather_wood: To gather a resource, select a worker, then RIGHT-CLICK a tree.
tutorial.reignofnether.gather_wood2: Select any villager, then RIGHT-CLICK any tree.
tutorial.reignofnether.tip.autoreturn: TIP: Workers keep gathering until told to do something else. Once they have at least 50 total resources they return it to the town centre.
tutorial.reignofnether.gather_ore: Now let's do the same thing for ore.
tutorial.reignofnether.beach_ore: Here's a beach with coal and copper we can get ore from.
tutorial.reignofnether.click_ore: Select a worker, then RIGHT-CLICK an ore block.
tutorial.reignofnether.click_ore2: Select any villager, then RIGHT-CLICK any ore block.
tutorial.reignofnether.tip.sand_richer: TIP: Sandy biomes like deserts and beaches have more and better ores.
tutorial.reignofnether.gather_food: While your other workers are busy on wood and ore, let's find some food.
tutorial.reignofnether.pigs: Here are some pigs that you can hunt for food.
tutorial.reignofnether.hunt_pig: Just like wood and ore, select a worker and RIGHT-CLICK an animal to start hunting it.
tutorial.reignofnether.hunt_pig2: Select any villager, then RIGHT-CLICK an animal and wait for it to be killed. Make sure that villager doesn't already have a full inventory.
tutorial.reignofnether.empty_pockets: Make sure your worker isn't holding any other resources!
tutorial.reignofnether.tip.dropped: TIP: If your worker can't hold all the food after hunting an animal, it will drop to the ground.
tutorial.reignofnether.tip.pick_up: TIP: Dropped items like food and saplings can be picked by ANY unit and returned for resources.
tutorial.reignofnether.return_food: Your villager should now return the food to your town centre, but if they aren't, simply select the villager and RIGHT-CLICK your Town Centre.
tutorial.reignofnether.return_food2: Select your villager that hunted the pig and RIGHT-CLICK your Town Centre.
tutorial.reignofnether.tip.max_carry: TIP: Units hold up to 100 total resources, but hunting allows you to go above this maximum.
tutorial.reignofnether.expand_base: Let's expand your base. Some new buildings have been unlocked for you. Select a worker if you haven't already to check them out.
tutorial.reignofnether.new_buildings: Select any worker to check out your new building options.
tutorial.reignofnether.stockpiles: Stockpiles can give your workers a place to drop off resources faster.
tutorial.reignofnether.houses: Houses raise your max unit population. Check the top left for your current totals.
tutorial.reignofnether.farms: Farms give you a slow but renewable source of food in exchange for wood.
tutorial.reignofnether.barracks: Finally, a barracks lets you start training soldiers to fight enemies.
tutorial.reignofnether.check_out_buildin: Let's take some time to check out a few of these buildings.
tutorial.reignofnether.build_barracks: When you're ready, build a barracks and get prepare to train your first army.
tutorial.reignofnether.build_barracks2: Select any villager and build a barracks building at the bottom left. Make sure you've gathered enough wood to afford it!
tutorial.reignofnether.select_barracks: The barracks is one of many buildings that can produce military units. Select your barracks to check them out.
tutorial.reignofnether.select_barracks2: Select your barracks to check out your military unit options
tutorial.reignofnether.vindicators: Vindicators are melee units with high health and moderate damage.
tutorial.reignofnether.pillagers: Pillagers are ranged units which attack slowly but with high damage.
tutorial.reignofnether.produce_illagers: Select your barracks and produce a total of 3 Pillagers and/or Vindicators. If you need more food try building a farm or hunt more animals. If you need more population supply, try building a house.
tutorial.reignofnether.three_units: Try building 3 units from here to continue.
tutorial.reignofnether.tip.select_milita: TIP: If you lose track of your military units, you can press K or click the button on the right to select all of them at once.
tutorial.reignofnether.monster_attack: Uh oh, looks like some monsters are about to attack!
tutorial.reignofnether.attack: With your units selected, RIGHT-CLICK an enemy to attack them. Units will also automatically attack nearby enemies if they are idle.
tutorial.reignofnether.defended: Nicely done, you successfully defended your base!
tutorial.reignofnether.tip.death_drops: TIP: During an attack, be sure to protect your workers. If a worker dies while holding resources, it is dropped and can be stolen by your enemies!
tutorial.reignofnether.buildings_damaged: Looks like some of your buildings were damaged in the attack.
tutorial.reignofnether.repair_buildings: Try repairing one of them by selecting a villager, then RIGHT-CLICKING the damaged building. Repairs cost 1 wood for each block.
tutorial.reignofnether.repair_buildings2: Select a worker and RIGHT-CLICK a damaged building, then wait for it to be fully repaired. Repairs cost 1 wood for each block.
tutorial.reignofnether.tip.building_heal: TIP: Building health is determined by how many blocks it's made up of. If they have less than half blocks remaining, they are destroyed completely.
tutorial.reignofnether.monster_base: The monsters have a base across the river (but you can't see it yet because fog of war is enabled). We should destroy it before they attack again.
tutorial.reignofnether.monster_base2: The monsters have a base across the river, we should destroy it before they attack again.
tutorial.reignofnether.build_bridge: To cross the river, we need to build a bridge.
tutorial.reignofnether.build_bridge2: This looks like a good spot for one. Select a worker and build a bridge here. You can scroll to rotate the bridge before placement.
tutorial.reignofnether.build_bridge3: Select a worker and build a bridge across the river. You can scroll to rotate the bridge. before placement. If the bridge is too short, you can build more segments connecting to it.
tutorial.reignofnether.tip.bridge_segmen: TIP: You may need more than one bridge segment to cross the river. After completing one you can connect new segments to it.
tutorial.reignofnether.tip.bridges_neutr: TIP: Bridges are always neutral regardless of who built them. This means anyone can attack, repair and connect new segments to them.
tutorial.reignofnether.tip.crossing_brid: TIP: Be very careful when crossing bridges. If it is destroyed while your units are crossing, they will land in the water and be defenceless!
tutorial.reignofnether.reinforcements: Reinforcements have arrived! Use them to crush the enemy base!
tutorial.reignofnether.iron_golem: Your army includes an iron golem and your workers can now build blacksmiths to produce more if needed.
tutorial.reignofnether.destroy_monster_b: Prepare your army and destroy all buildings in the monsters' base
tutorial.reignofnether.tip.ranged_no_bui: TIP: Most ranged units can't attack buildings. Order them to attack units instead!
tutorial.reignofnether.tip.monster_capit: TIP: The monsters' capitol, the Mausoleum, produces an artificial night time around it. If you can destroy it during the day, undead units will burn under the sun.
tutorial.reignofnether.congratulations_t: Congratulations! You have completed the tutorial!
tutorial.reignofnether.continue: You may now continue with all of the buildings and units unlocked.
tutorial.reignofnether.reset_game: To reset the game and try a new faction, type /rts-reset
tutorial.reignofnether.server_hosting: If you would like to play against another player, check out the Reign of Nether CurseForge page for a guide on server hosting.
tutorial.reignofnether.good_luck: Until next time... Good luck and have fun!
units.monsters.reignofnether.creeper.too: An explosive monster that can blow up units and buildings.
Deals less damage to capitol buildings.
Creepers move much more slowly under sunlight.
units.monsters.reignofnether.drowned.too: An infectious variant of the zombie which zombifies
villagers and piglins after killing them.
Requires an upgrade at the Laboratory.
units.monsters.reignofnether.husk.toolti: A hardy variant of the zombie with tougher skin.
Husks DO NOT burn under sunlight.
Requires an upgrade at the Laboratory.
units.monsters.reignofnether.poison_spid: A spider fanged with deadly poison.
Spiders move much more slowly under sunlight.
Requires an upgrade at the Laboratory.
units.monsters.reignofnether.skeleton.to: An undead soldier with a bow and arrows.
units.monsters.reignofnether.spider.tool: A giant spider that is nimble but frail.
Can be upgraded to allow skeletons to ride them.
Spiders move much more slowly under sunlight.
units.monsters.reignofnether.stray.toolt: An chilling variant of the skeleton that fires slowing arrows.
Requires an upgrade at the Laboratory.
units.monsters.reignofnether.warden.tool: A powerful but blind monster that can fire sonic booms.
units.monsters.reignofnether.zombie.tool: An undead monster with a basic melee attack.
units.monsters.reignofnether.zombie_vill: An undead worker that can construct and
Zombie villagers DO NOT burn under sunlight.
units.piglins.reignofnether.blaze.toolti: A fiery elemental that shoots fireballs from afar.
Attacks are fast and ignite enemies but inaccurate.
units.piglins.reignofnether.brute.toolti: A piglin armed with a sword for combat.
units.piglins.reignofnether.ghast.toolti: A massive flying creature that fires explosive fireballs
from a great distance to siege units and buildings.
Slow and fragile, but can only be targeted by ranged units.
units.piglins.reignofnether.grunt.toolti: A piglin worker that can construct and
A piglin that throws tridents in battle.
units.piglins.reignofnether.hoglin.toolt: A beast trained for war. Deals 50%% more damage to buildings.
Can be upgraded to be mountable by Headhunters.
units.piglins.reignofnether.wither_skele: A charcoal black skeleton that afflicts
wither on enemies and deals bonus damage
(up to double) to enemies near death.
units.villagers.reignofnether.evoker.too: A learned wizard that can cast combat spells.
units.villagers.reignofnether.iron_golem: A slow hulking golem of metal with a powerful melee.
attack that deals double damage to buildings.
units.villagers.reignofnether.pillager.t: A villager armed with a crossbow for ranged combat.
Upgraded with multishot crossbows that fire triple arrows
units.villagers.reignofnether.ravager.to: An enormous beast that can smash through hordes of enemies.
They can roar to knockback enemies and be mounted by pillagers.
units.villagers.reignofnether.villager.t: A worker that can construct and repair
units.villagers.reignofnether.vindicator: A villager armed with an axe for melee combat.
Upgraded with diamond axes that deal +2 damage
units.villagers.reignofnether.witch.tool: A devious hag who can heal and harm with potions.
